metadata.titleCn: 祁连山综合观测网：黑河流域地表过程综合观测网（大满超级站大孔径闪烁仪-2020）
metadata.description:
This dataset contains the flux measurements from the large aperture scintillometer (LAS) at Daman Superstation in the Heihe integrated observatory network from January 1 to December 6 in 2020. There were two types of LASs at Daman Superstation: BLS900 and RR-RSS460, produced by Germany. The north tower was set up with the BLS900 receiver and the RR-RSS460 transmitter, and the south tower was equipped with the BLS900 transmitter and the RR-RSS460 receiver. The site (north: 100.379° E, 38.861° N; south: 100.369° E, 38.847° N) was located in Daman irrigation district, which is near Zhangye, Gansu Province. The underlying surfaces between the two towers were corn, orchard, and greenhouse. The elevation is 1556 m. The effective height of the LASs was 24.1 m, and the path length was 1854 m. The data were sampled 1 minute at both BLS900 and RR-RSS460.
The raw data acquired at 1 min intervals were processed and quality controlled. The data were subsequently averaged over 30 min periods, in which sensible heat flux was iteratively calculated by combining Cn2 with meteorological data according to the Monin-Obukhov similarity theory. The main quality control steps were as follows: (1) The data were rejected when Cn2 exceeded the saturated criterion (BLS900：Cn2>7.25E-14，RR-RSS460：Cn2>7.84 E-14). (2) The data were rejected when the demodulation signal was small (BLS900：Average X Intensity<1000；RR-RSS460：Demod>-20mv). (3) The data were rejected when collected during precipitation. (4) The data were rejected if collected at night when weak turbulence occurred (u* was less than 0.1 m/s). In the iteration process, the universal functions of Thiermann and Grassl (1992) and Andreas (1988) were selected for BLS900 and RR-RSS460, respectively. Detailed can refer to Liu et al. (2011, 2013). Due to instrument adjustment and inadequate power supply, the date of missing data for the large aperture scintillator is: 2020.06.21-2020.06.23；2020.09.21-2020.10.14. 
Several instructions were included with the released data. (1) The data were primarily obtained from BLS900 measurements, and missing flux measurements from the BLS900 instrument were substituted with measurements from the RR-RSS460 instrument. The missing data were denoted by -6999. (2) The dataset contained the following variables: Date/time (yyyy/m/d h:mm), the structural parameter of the air refractive index (Cn2, m-2/3), and the sensible heat flux (H, W/m^2). In this dataset, a time of 0:30 corresponds to the average data for the period between 0:00 and 0:30, and the data were stored in *.xlsx format. 
For more information, please refer to Liu et al. (2018) (for sites information), Liu et al. (2011) (for data processing) in the Citation section.
metadata.descriptionCn:
该数据集包含了黑河流域地表过程综合观测网中游大满站的大孔径闪烁仪通量观测数据。中游大满站分别架设了BLS900和RR-RSS460型号的大孔径闪烁仪，北塔为BLS900的接收端和RR-RSS460的发射端，南塔为BLS900的发射端和RR-RSS460的接收端。观测时间为2020年1月1日至2020年12月6日。站点位于甘肃省张掖市大满灌区内，下垫面是玉米、果园和大棚，以玉米为主。北塔的经纬度是100.3785E，38.8607N，南塔的经纬度是100.3685E，38.8468N，海拔高度约1556m。大孔径闪烁仪的有效高度24.1m，光径长度是1854m，采样频率是1min。
大孔径闪烁仪原始观测数据为1min，发布的数据为经过处理与质量控制后的数据，其中感热通量主要是结合自动气象站观测数据，基于莫宁-奥布霍夫相似理论通过迭代计算得到，主要的质量控制步骤包括：（1）剔除Cn2达到饱和的数据（BLS900：Cn2>7.25E-14，RR-RSS460：Cn2>7.84 E-14）；（2）剔除解调信号强度较弱的数据（BLS900：Average X Intensity<1000；RR-RSS460：Demod>-20mv）；（3）剔除降水时刻的数据；（4）剔除稳定条件下的弱湍流的数据（u*小于0.1m/s）。在迭代计算过程中，对于BLS900，选取Thiermann and Grassl(1992)的稳定度普适函数；对于RR-RSS460，选取Andreas(1988)的稳定度普适函数，详细介绍请参考Liu et al. (2011, 2013)。由于仪器维修、供电不足和信号问题，大孔径闪烁仪数据缺失的日期为：2020.06.21-2020.06.23；2020.09.21-2020.10.14。
关于发布数据的几点说明：（1）中游LAS数据以BLS900为主，缺失时刻由RR-RSS460观测补充，两者都缺失则以-6999标记。（2）数据表头：Date/Time ：日期/时间（格式：yyyy/m/d h:mm），Cn2 ：空气折射指数结构参数（单位：m-2/3），H：感热通量（单位：W/m2）。数据时间的含义，如0:30代表0:00-0:30的平均；数据以*.xlsx格式存储。
黑河流域地表过程综合观测网或站点信息请参考Liu et al. (2018)，观测数据处理请参考Liu et al. (2011)。

background: Arid and semiarid regions represent approximately 30 % of the global terrestrial surface area (Dregne, 1991; Scanlon et al., 2006), and dryland expansion occurs under climate change, especially in developing countries (Huang et al., 2016). An oasis is a unique ecological landscape in arid and semi-arid areas that is not only the core of regions’ ecological environment but also the foundation of their economic development, especially in western China, which has been an important part of the “Silk Road” since ancient times. Oases comprising less than 10 % of the total area of arid regions support more than 90 % of the population in these regions of China (Chu et al., 2005; Li et al., 2016; Zhou et al., 2022). The oasis–desert system plays a crucial role in maintaining a stable ecological environment and agricultural productivity (Zhang and Zhao, 2015). Extensive studies have investigated energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas based on field and remote-sensing observations (Taha et al., 1991; Potchter et al., 2008; Xue et al., 2019; Wang et al., 2019; Zhou et al., 2022) and numerical simulations (Chu et al., 2005; Meng et al., 2009; Georgescu et al., 2011; Liu et al., 2020). In addition, oasis–desert areas located in semiarid regions have been found to be carbon sinks by previous researchers (Tagesson et al., 2016; Wang et al., 2019); thus, they can significantly affect the carbon balance of arid regions and play an increasingly important role within the global carbon cycle.
research objective: Therefore, it is critical to maintain the balance between oasis and desert systems in order to achieve the goal of sustainable oasis development. Understanding the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems is important to achieve the goals of carbon peaking and carbon neutrality in the oasis–desert area and support the ecological security and sustainable development of the oasis. A quantitative understanding of the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas is crucial to recognize the oasis–desert interactions and is significant to protect the ecological stability and socioeconomic development of oases; moreover, long-term observations are indispensable.
challenges: Inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas are facing the crisis of ecological environment degradation, such as the drying up of rivers and lakes, the degradation of natural vegetation, the intensification of land desertification, and the frequent occurrence of dust storms, especially in many inland river basins westward along the Silk Road, such as the Tarim River basin (Zhao et al., 2013), the Aral Sea basin (Stanev et al., 2004; Crétaux et al., 2009), and the Lake Urmia basin (Stone, 2015).
methods: In this study, we present a suite of observational datasets from artificial and natural oasis–desert systems that consist of long-term energy, water vapor, carbon and methane fluxes as well as auxiliary data involving hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters from 2012 to 2021. Half-hourly turbulent flux data were acquired by an eddy covariance system and scintillometer. The hydrometeorological data (including radiation, soil heat flux, and soil temperature profiles; gradients of air temperature and humidity and of wind speed and direction; and air pressure, precipitation, and soil moisture profiles) were observed from automatic weather stations with a 10 min average period as well as the groundwater table data. Moreover, vegetation and soil parameters were also supplemented in the datasets. The data processing and quality control procedure can be divided into data collection, data processing, and data archiving and sharing.
dataset: The study area comprises the middle and lower reaches of the HRB, located in the arid regions of western China, that receive water from the typical cryosphere of the upper reaches. A total of 11 land surface flux and meteorological stations have been established in these regions since 2012 – 2 superstations and 9 ordinary stations. The dataset of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations in oasis–desert areas reported in this study (including energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes; hydrometeorological data; and vegetation and soil parameters) is freely available from the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center.
backgroundCn: 干旱和半干旱地区大约占全球陆地表面积的30%（Dregne, 1991；Scanlon et al., 2006），在气候变化的影响下，干旱地区的扩展尤其发生在发展中国家（Huang et al., 2016）。绿洲是干旱和半干旱地区独特的生态景观，不仅是这些地区生态环境的核心，也是其经济发展的基础，特别是在中国西部，自古以来就一直是“丝绸之路”的重要组成部分。绿洲占干旱地区总面积的不到10%，却支持着中国这些地区90%以上的人口（Chu et al., 2005；Li et al., 2016；Zhou et al., 2022）。绿洲-沙漠系统在维持稳定的生态环境和农业生产力方面发挥着至关重要的作用（Zhang and Zhao, 2015）。大量研究基于实地和遥感观测（Taha et al., 1991；Potchter et al., 2008；Xue et al., 2019；Wang et al., 2019；Zhou et al., 2022）以及数值模拟（Chu et al., 2005；Meng et al., 2009；Georgescu et al., 2011；Liu et al., 2020）对绿洲-沙漠地区的能量、水汽和碳交换进行了广泛研究。此外，位于半干旱地区的绿洲-沙漠区域已被先前研究者发现为碳汇（Tagesson et al., 2016；Wang et al., 2019）；因此，它们可以显著影响干旱地区的碳平衡，并在全球碳循环中发挥越来越重要的作用。
research objectiveCn: 因此，维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡对于实现可持续绿洲发展的目标至关重要。了解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的基本特征，对于实现绿洲-沙漠地区的碳达峰和碳中和目标，以及支持绿洲的生态安全和可持续发展具有重要意义。对绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换的定量理解，对于认识绿洲-沙漠之间的相互作用至关重要，并且对保护生态稳定性和绿洲的社会经济发展具有重要意义；此外，长期观测是不可或缺的。
challengesCn: 内陆河流流域在干旱和半干旱地区面临生态环境退化的危机，例如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及沙尘暴频发，尤其是在丝绸之路沿线的许多内陆河流流域，如塔里木河流域（赵等，2013）、咸海流域（Stanev等，2004；Crétaux等，2009）和乌尔米湖流域（Stone，2015）。
methodsCn: 在本研究中，我们呈现了一套来自人工和自然绿洲–沙漠系统的观测数据集，包括2012年至2021年的长期能量、水蒸气、碳和甲烷通量，以及涉及水文气象、植被和土壤参数的辅助数据。半小时的湍流通量数据是通过涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪获取的。水文气象数据（包括辐射、土壤热通量和土壤温度剖面；空气温度和湿度的梯度、风速和风向的梯度；以及气压、降水和土壤湿度剖面）是通过自动气象站以10分钟的平均周期观测的，同时还包括地下水位数据。此外，数据集中还补充了植被和土壤参数。数据处理和质量控制程序可以分为数据收集、数据处理和数据归档与共享。
datasetCn: 研究区域包括位于中国西部干旱地区的HRB中下游，水源来自上游典型的冰冻圈。自2012年以来，在这些地区建立了11个地表通量和气象站，包括2个超级站和9个普通站。本研究报告的绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换观测数据集（包括能量、水汽和碳通量；水文气象数据；以及植被和土壤参数）可从国家西藏高原数据中心免费获取。

Concept Completion.AnswerCn: 涡度相关系统，闪烁仪，自动气象站

Example.QuestionEn: Could you provide an example of how datasets from oasis–desert systems are structured and shared?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个关于绿洲-沙漠系统的数据集结构和共享方式的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: Datasets from oasis–desert systems, such as those from the middle and lower reaches of the Heihe River Basin, include energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes, along with hydrometeorological data and vegetation and soil parameters. These datasets are freely available from the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center.
Example.AnswerCn: 来自绿洲-沙漠系统的数据集，例如来自黑河流域中下游的数据显示，包括能量、水汽和碳通量，以及水文气象数据和植被与土壤参数。这些数据集可以从国家青藏高原数据中心免费获取。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the specific data collection techniques used to measure energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert systems?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠系统中，用于测量能量、水蒸气和碳交换的具体数据收集技术有哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: eddy covariance system, scintillometer, automatic weather stations, half-hourly turbulent flux data, 10-minute average period
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 涡度相关系统，闪烁仪，自动气象站，半小时湍流通量数据，10分钟平均周期

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of the data quality control procedures used in collecting environmental data from oasis–desert ecosystems?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 收集绿洲-沙漠生态系统环境数据时使用的数据质量控制程序的特点是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: data collection, processing, archiving and sharing, removing saturated data, demodulation signals with weak intensities, excluding data during precipitation, eliminating weak turbulence data under stable conditions
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 数据收集、处理、存档和共享，去除饱和数据，解调弱强度信号，排除降水期间的数据，消除稳定条件下的弱湍流数据。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many land surface flux and meteorological stations have been established in the HRB region since 2012?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 自2012年以来，在HRB地区建立了多少个陆面通量和气象站？

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'eddy covariance system' refer to in the context of measuring turbulent fluxes?
Definition.QuestionCn: “涡动协方差系统”是指在测量湍流通量的背景下使用的一种技术。
Definition.AnswerEn: An eddy covariance system is a method used to measure and calculate the turbulent fluxes of energy, water vapor, and gases like carbon dioxide and methane between the land surface and the atmosphere. It involves high-frequency measurements of wind speed and scalar quantities, allowing for precise quantification of exchanges in oasis–desert ecosystems, as mentioned in the context of datasets from 2012 to 2021.
Definition.AnswerCn: 涡度协方差系统是一种用于测量和计算能量、水蒸气以及二氧化碳和甲烷等气体在陆地表面与大气之间的湍流通量的方法。它涉及对风速和标量量的高频测量，从而精确量化绿洲-沙漠生态系统中的交换，正如提到的2012年至2021年的数据集所示。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the data collection methods using large aperture scintillometers compare to those using eddy covariance systems for measuring energy and water vapor fluxes in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 大型孔径闪烁仪的数据收集方法与涡动协方差系统在测量绿洲-沙漠生态系统中的能量和水汽通量方面有何比较？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Large aperture scintillometers, like those used in the 黑河流域大满站, focus on measuring sensible heat fluxes by utilizing the refractive index of the air, whereas eddy covariance systems capture turbulent fluxes including both energy and water vapor fluxes. The scintillometer data is collected at a high frequency (1min) but requires integration with meteorological data for processing, while eddy covariance provides half-hourly flux data and can directly measure various parameters including carbon fluxes.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 大型孔径闪烁仪，如在黑河流域大满站使用的，专注于通过利用空气的折射率来测量显热通量，而涡度协方差系统则捕获包括能量和水蒸气通量在内的湍流通量。闪烁仪数据以高频率（1分钟）收集，但需要与气象数据集成进行处理，而涡度协方差则提供半小时的通量数据，并可以直接测量包括碳通量在内的各种参数。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the differences in data quality control procedures between datasets collected by automatic weather stations and those collected by large aperture scintillometers in arid and semi-arid regions?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 自动气象站收集的数据与大型孔径闪烁仪在干旱和半干旱地区收集的数据之间的数据质量控制程序有什么区别？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Data collected by large aperture scintillometers undergo quality control steps such as removing saturated data based on specific Cn2 thresholds, weak signal data, precipitation data, and weak turbulence data. In contrast, automatic weather stations provide data with a 10-minute average period and involve standard meteorological observations, which may not require the same specific filtering processes related to Cn2 saturation or weak turbulence.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 大型孔径闪烁仪收集的数据经过质量控制步骤，例如根据特定的Cn2阈值去除饱和数据、弱信号数据、降水数据和弱湍流数据。相比之下，自动气象站提供的数据具有10分钟的平均周期，并涉及标准气象观测，这些数据可能不需要与Cn2饱和或弱湍流相关的相同特定过滤过程。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What can be inferred about the effectiveness of quality control measures in data collection methods for large aperture scintillometer observations in arid regions?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 可以推断出，在干旱地区的大孔径闪烁仪观测中，数据收集方法的质量控制措施的有效性。
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Quality control measures are crucial in ensuring the reliability of data collected by large aperture scintillometers, especially in challenging environments like arid regions. The dataset highlights specific quality control steps, such as removing saturated data, weak signal data, precipitation-affected data, and data with weak turbulence. These steps indicate a rigorous approach to ensure data accuracy and reliability under varying environmental conditions.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 质量控制措施在确保大孔径闪烁仪收集的数据可靠性方面至关重要，尤其是在干旱地区等具有挑战性的环境中。该数据集强调了特定的质量控制步骤，例如去除饱和数据、弱信号数据、受降水影响的数据以及具有弱湍流的数据。这些步骤表明了一种严格的方法，以确保在不同环境条件下数据的准确性和可靠性。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How might the data collection techniques employed in oasis–desert ecosystems contribute to understanding the balance between energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中采用的数据收集技术如何有助于理解能量、水蒸气和碳交换之间的平衡？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The use of observational datasets from oasis–desert systems, incorporating energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes, along with auxiliary data from hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters, provides a comprehensive view of ecosystem exchanges. Techniques like eddy covariance systems and scintillometers allow for detailed analysis of these exchanges, contributing to understanding the ecological balance and interactions within the oasis–desert systems.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 使用来自绿洲-沙漠系统的观测数据集，结合能量、水蒸气和碳通量，以及来自水文气象、植被和土壤参数的辅助数据，提供了对生态系统交换的全面视角。像涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪这样的技术允许对这些交换进行详细分析，有助于理解绿洲-沙漠系统内的生态平衡和相互作用。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is it important to maintain long-term observations in oasis–desert ecosystems when studying energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在研究绿洲-沙漠生态系统中的能量、水汽和碳交换时，维持长期观测的重要性是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Long-term observations are crucial to quantitatively understand the basic characteristics and interactions of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges, which are vital for achieving sustainable oasis development and ensuring ecological security.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 长期观察对于定量理解能量、水汽和碳交换的基本特征和相互作用至关重要，这对实现可持续绿洲发展和确保生态安全至关重要。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What leads to the data gaps or missing data periods during energy and flux data collection in inland river basins within arid and semiarid regions?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区的内陆河流流域中，能源和通量数据收集期间导致数据缺口或缺失数据时期的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Data gaps or missing periods are often caused by factors like equipment maintenance, insufficient power supply, and signal issues, which can interrupt continuous data collection and lead to incomplete datasets.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 数据缺口或缺失时期通常是由于设备维护、供电不足和信号问题等因素造成的，这些因素可能会中断连续的数据收集，从而导致数据集不完整。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How does the utilization of large aperture scintillometers impact the quality and reliability of data in measuring energy and water vapor exchanges in oasis-desert ecosystems?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 大型孔径闪烁仪的使用如何影响在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中测量能量和水汽交换的数据质量和可靠性？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The use of large aperture scintillometers, such as BLS900 and RR-RSS460, allows for the direct measurement of sensible heat fluxes with high temporal resolution. This method contributes to understanding energy exchanges by providing reliable data, especially when supplemented with automatic weather station observations and quality control processes. The effective quality control steps, including excluding saturated data and weak signals, ensure the reliability of the measurements.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 大型孔径闪烁仪，如BLS900和RR-RSS460，能够以高时间分辨率直接测量显热通量。这种方法通过提供可靠的数据，尤其是在补充自动气象站观测和质量控制过程时，有助于理解能量交换。有效的质量控制步骤，包括排除饱和数据和弱信号，确保了测量的可靠性。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of missing data periods on the accuracy and completeness of long-term flux datasets in inland river basins?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 缺失数据时期对内陆河流流域长期通量数据集的准确性和完整性可能产生的后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Missing data periods, due to issues such as instrument maintenance or power outages, can lead to gaps in long-term datasets, affecting the continuity and completeness of the observations. Such gaps can complicate the analysis of trends and cycles in energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange, potentially impacting the understanding of ecological interactions and the development of sustainable management strategies for oasis–desert systems. However, using multiple instruments to fill these gaps, as in the replacement of BLS900 data with RR-RSS460, can mitigate some of these issues.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 由于仪器维护或停电等问题，缺失的数据周期可能导致长期数据集中的空白，影响观测的连续性和完整性。这些空白可能会使能源、水蒸气和碳交换的趋势和周期分析变得复杂，从而影响对生态相互作用的理解以及对绿洲-沙漠系统可持续管理策略的制定。然而，使用多种仪器来填补这些空白，例如用RR-RSS460替代BLS900数据，可以缓解一些这些问题。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: In what ways can integrating datasets from multiple land surface flux and meteorological stations improve the understanding of oasis-desert interactions in arid regions?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 整合来自多个土地表面通量和气象站的数据可以通过以下方式提高对干旱地区绿洲-沙漠相互作用的理解：
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Integrating datasets from multiple stations, including superstations and ordinary stations, enhances the spatial and temporal representativeness of observations. This integration provides comprehensive data on energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges, which is critical for analyzing the interactions between oasis and desert ecosystems. The diverse data collection methods and parameters, such as hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil profiles, support a more detailed and nuanced understanding of these complex systems, contributing to ecological security and sustainable development goals.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 整合来自多个站点的数据，包括超级站和普通站，增强了观测的空间和时间代表性。这种整合提供了关于能量、水汽和碳交换的全面数据，这对于分析绿洲与沙漠生态系统之间的相互作用至关重要。多样的数据收集方法和参数，如水文气象、植被和土壤剖面，支持对这些复杂系统的更详细和细致的理解，有助于生态安全和可持续发展目标的实现。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to develop a dataset that captures the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 开发一个捕捉绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换的数据集是重要的原因是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Understanding the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems is crucial for achieving carbon peaking and carbon neutrality goals. It supports ecological security and sustainable development by providing insights into oasis–desert interactions and their impact on ecological stability and socioeconomic development.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 了解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的基本特征，对于实现碳达峰和碳中和目标至关重要。它通过提供对绿洲-沙漠相互作用及其对生态稳定性和社会经济发展的影响的洞察，支持生态安全和可持续发展。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the objectives behind acquiring long-term observational datasets from artificial and natural oasis–desert systems?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 获取人工和自然绿洲-沙漠系统的长期观测数据集的目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The objective is to achieve a quantitative understanding of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas, which is significant for recognizing oasis–desert interactions and protecting ecological stability. Long-term observations are indispensable for these goals, especially in the context of sustainable oasis development.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是实现对绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换的定量理解，这对于认识绿洲-沙漠相互作用和保护生态稳定性具有重要意义。长期观测对于实现这些目标至关重要，尤其是在可持续绿洲发展的背景下。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How are long-term observational datasets collected and maintained for studying energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert systems?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 长期观测数据集是如何收集和维护的，以研究绿洲-沙漠系统中的能量、水蒸气和碳交换？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Long-term observational datasets in oasis–desert systems are collected using eddy covariance systems and scintillometers for turbulent flux data, alongside automatic weather stations that provide hydrometeorological data. These datasets include energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes, as well as auxiliary data like soil and vegetation parameters. The data collection process ensures comprehensive coverage of environmental parameters and is supported by data archiving and sharing practices to maintain long-term availability.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 在绿洲-沙漠系统中，长期观测数据集通过涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪收集湍流通量数据，同时使用自动气象站提供水文气象数据。这些数据集包括能量、水蒸气和碳通量，以及土壤和植被参数等辅助数据。数据收集过程确保了环境参数的全面覆盖，并通过数据归档和共享实践来维护长期可用性。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What observational technologies are essential for collecting long-term data on energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些观测技术对于收集绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换的长期数据是必不可少的？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Essential observational technologies include eddy covariance systems and scintillometers for acquiring turbulent flux data, as well as automatic weather stations for hydrometeorological data such as radiation, soil heat flux, air temperature and humidity gradients, wind speed and direction, air pressure, precipitation, and soil moisture profiles.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 基本的观测技术包括涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪，用于获取湍流通量数据，以及自动气象站，用于获取水文气象数据，如辐射、土壤热通量、空气温度和湿度梯度、风速和风向、气压、降水量和土壤湿度剖面。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How do data processing and quality control procedures facilitate the reliable collection and use of environmental data in arid and semi-arid regions?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 数据处理和质量控制程序如何促进干旱和半干旱地区环境数据的可靠收集和使用。
Enablement.AnswerEn: Data processing and quality control procedures involve steps like data collection, processing, and archiving which help in maintaining reliability. Specific quality control steps include removing saturated data, weak signal data, and data during precipitation or under weak turbulence conditions. These ensure the data is accurate and reliable for studying environmental parameters.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 数据处理和质量控制程序包括数据收集、处理和归档等步骤，这有助于保持可靠性。具体的质量控制步骤包括去除饱和数据、弱信号数据以及在降水或弱湍流条件下的数据。这些步骤确保数据在研究环境参数时的准确性和可靠性。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What infrastructural requirements are necessary to establish and maintain meteorological and flux measurement stations in remote oasis–desert regions?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 在偏远的绿洲-沙漠地区建立和维护气象和通量测量站所需的基础设施要求是什么？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Infrastructural requirements include well-maintained superstations and ordinary stations equipped with flux measurement technology like large aperture scintillometers and eddy covariance systems. Consistent power supply and maintenance to prevent data loss due to equipment failure are also crucial, as demonstrated by the data gaps due to instrument maintenance and power issues.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 基础设施要求包括维护良好的超级站和普通站，配备有大孔径闪烁仪和涡度协方差系统等通量测量技术。稳定的电力供应和维护对于防止因设备故障导致的数据丢失也至关重要，这一点在由于仪器维护和电力问题造成的数据缺口中得到了证明。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might data collection methods in arid and semi-arid regions face challenges in maintaining long-term observation consistency, particularly in oasis–desert systems?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区，尤其是在绿洲-沙漠系统中，数据收集方法在维持长期观察一致性方面可能面临挑战，原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Inland river basins in arid and semi-arid areas face ecological degradation challenges like river and lake drying, vegetation degradation, land desertification, and dust storms, which can affect consistent long-term observations.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 内陆河流流域在干旱和半干旱地区面临生态退化的挑战，如河流和湖泊干涸、植被退化、土地沙漠化以及沙尘暴，这些都可能影响长期的一致性观察。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What challenges might arise in ensuring the accuracy and reliability of data collected by large aperture scintillometers in complex terrains like the oasis–desert regions?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在像绿洲-沙漠地区这样的复杂地形中，确保大型孔径闪烁仪收集的数据的准确性和可靠性可能会面临哪些挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Challenges in ensuring data accuracy might arise from environmental factors such as instrument maintenance issues, power supply problems, and signal interference, which can lead to data gaps or inaccuracies.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 确保数据准确性面临的挑战可能来自环境因素，例如仪器维护问题、电源供应问题和信号干扰，这可能导致数据缺失或不准确。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might there be expectations for datasets involving oasis–desert systems to include a wide range of auxiliary data parameters beyond basic meteorological observations?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么人们可能期望涉及绿洲-沙漠系统的数据集包含比基本气象观测更广泛的辅助数据参数？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Expectations for comprehensive datasets arise because understanding energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange requires auxiliary data on hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil, which are crucial for recognizing oasis–desert interactions and supporting ecological and socioeconomic stability.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 对综合数据集的期望源于理解能量、水汽和碳交换需要关于水文气象、植被和土壤的辅助数据，这对于识别绿洲-沙漠相互作用以及支持生态和社会经济稳定至关重要。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What is your evaluation of the effectiveness of using large aperture scintillometers for measuring energy fluxes in arid regions?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 我对在干旱地区使用大孔径闪烁仪测量能量通量的有效性进行评估。
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The use of large aperture scintillometers, such as BLS900 and RR-RSS460, appears to be effective for measuring energy fluxes in arid regions like the Heihe River Basin. These instruments allow for detailed analysis of surface processes by providing data on sensible heat flux through iterative calculations based on the Monin-Obukhov similarity theory. The data is thoroughly quality-controlled, and the process includes handling conditions like saturation and weak signal strength. However, challenges such as instrument maintenance and environmental factors causing data gaps highlight the need for robust data collection and quality assurance strategies.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 大型孔径闪烁仪，如BLS900和RR-RSS460，在像黑河流域这样的干旱地区测量能量通量方面似乎非常有效。这些仪器通过基于Monin-Obukhov相似理论的迭代计算提供关于感热通量的数据，从而允许对表面过程进行详细分析。数据经过严格的质量控制，处理过程中包括应对饱和和弱信号强度等条件。然而，仪器维护和环境因素导致的数据缺口等挑战突显了需要强有力的数据收集和质量保证策略。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How would you judge the challenges faced in maintaining long-term observational datasets in oasis-desert regions?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 您如何评估在绿洲-沙漠地区维护长期观测数据集所面临的挑战？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Maintaining long-term observational datasets in oasis-desert regions presents significant challenges, including ecological degradation, drying rivers, vegetation loss, and increased desertification. These environmental crises, exacerbated by climate change, necessitate comprehensive monitoring systems combining field and remote-sensing observations. Additionally, the need for continuous and reliable data for understanding energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges further complicates the maintenance of these datasets, as demonstrated by the data gaps seen due to instrument issues and environmental conditions.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 在绿洲-沙漠地区维护长期观测数据集面临重大挑战，包括生态退化、河流干涸、植被丧失和沙漠化加剧。这些环境危机因气候变化而加剧，迫切需要综合监测系统，结合实地和遥感观测。此外，理解能量、水蒸气和碳交换所需的连续可靠数据进一步复杂化了这些数据集的维护，正如由于仪器问题和环境条件导致的数据缺口所示。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What are your thoughts on the potential for expanding datasets related to energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in arid regions?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 我对在干旱地区扩展与能源、水蒸气和碳交换相关的数据集的潜力有何看法？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Expanding datasets in arid regions, particularly for energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange, holds great potential for enhancing our understanding of oasis-desert systems. Given the critical role of these regions in maintaining ecological stability and supporting socio-economic development, there is a need for integrated data collection methods such as eddy covariance systems, scintillometers, and comprehensive hydrometeorological observations. The availability of such datasets, as seen with the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center, supports research objectives but requires continuous efforts in data archiving and sharing to ensure access and utility for broader scientific analysis.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 在干旱地区扩展数据集，特别是针对能量、水汽和碳交换，具有增强我们对绿洲-沙漠系统理解的巨大潜力。鉴于这些地区在维持生态稳定和支持社会经济发展方面的关键作用，迫切需要集成数据收集方法，如涡度协方差系统、闪烁仪和综合水文气象观测。正如国家西藏高原数据中心所示，这些数据集的可用性支持研究目标，但需要持续努力进行数据归档和共享，以确保更广泛的科学分析能够获得和利用这些数据。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure about the challenges faced in maintaining continuous data collection in arid and semi-arid regions.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我对在干旱和半干旱地区维持持续数据收集所面临的挑战感到不确定。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Continuous data collection in arid and semi-arid regions faces challenges such as ecological environment degradation, drying rivers and lakes, natural vegetation degradation, intensified land desertification, and dust storms. Additionally, there are practical issues like instrument maintenance, power supply shortages, and signal problems that can lead to data gaps.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区，持续的数据收集面临着生态环境退化、河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及沙尘暴等挑战。此外，还有一些实际问题，如仪器维护、电力供应不足和信号问题，这些都可能导致数据缺口。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore potential data collection methods that could enhance the understanding of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems beyond the use of scintillometers and eddy covariance systems.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探讨潜在的数据收集方法，以增强对绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换的理解，超越使用闪烁仪和涡度协方差系统。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: In the field of oasis–desert ecosystems, data collection methods could be expanded by integrating remote sensing technologies, which provide large-scale observations and can complement ground-based instruments like scintillometers and eddy covariance systems. Remote sensing can help capture spatial variability and offer insights into land surface conditions over extensive areas. Additionally, deploying drone-based sensors can provide high-resolution data on vegetation and soil parameters, which are crucial for modeling and understanding ecosystem exchanges. Moreover, implementing sensor networks for continuous monitoring of hydrometeorological parameters and utilizing machine learning algorithms for data interpretation can further enhance data collection efforts.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统领域，数据收集方法可以通过整合遥感技术进行扩展，这些技术提供大规模的观测，并可以补充地面仪器，如闪烁仪和涡度协方差系统。遥感可以帮助捕捉空间变异性，并提供关于广泛区域地表条件的洞察。此外，部署基于无人机的传感器可以提供关于植被和土壤参数的高分辨率数据，这对于建模和理解生态系统交换至关重要。此外，实施传感器网络以持续监测水文气象参数，并利用机器学习算法进行数据解释，可以进一步增强数据收集工作。
